content: i own a truly unacceptable number of cabled sweaters but the time and energy it takes to knit one can be daunting the sweater weather boot cuffs is a free version of the sweater weather beanie and sweater weather socks and take some of my favorite cable sweater patterns and integrates them into cozy boot cuffs that works up much faster than any sweater with a central diamond cable motif the sweater weather boot cuffs also feature horseshoe cables simple braid cables and some moss stitch so all you really need to know how to do is knit and purl stitches needles size 5 and 7 needles or size needed to achieve gauge either circulars or double-pointed needles yarn 90-110 yards or 50 grams of worsted weight yarn please use tag #sweaterweatherbootcuffs for any photos you post on instagram this pattern is available for both personal and commercial use feel adapt as you wish but do not resell this pattern for profit
